2nd column

5202ee4e-11bd-45ab-acc5-12ca4dc626c2.content_description: Detailed narrative describing Milestone 2, focusing on the development and significance of the new framework or model.
content: Achieved profitability in FY 2019, demonstrating efficient execution and healthy unit economics

Maintained an average annual growth rate of 150% (excluding 2021)

57b72d04-46e0-4234-80ae-515e2a47d0b1.content_description: Title for Milestone/Phase 3 (e.g., Expansion, Growth, Scaling Operations).

Collaborated with 100+ clients and 500+ projects across various industries
19f17175-d1e4-4402-bf7a-cac1e6411d20.content_description: Detailed narrative describing Milestone 3, including metrics on client growth, expanded service offerings, and project volume.
content: Became the only Vietnamese brand consistently ranked in the Top 10 makeup market share
Grew market share from 0.9% (2018) to 3.2% (2022) in color cosmetics
Leveraged an asset-light model, outsourcing manufacturing to certified Korean factories (e.g., Cosmax)
Customized core products (e.g., Baby Skin Cushion) for Vietnamese skin and climate (e.g., SPF 50+)

a271d12a-9032-43a8-8bea-450d78b827bd.content_description: Section Header: Title for the qualitative analysis section focusing on the causes or enablers of the market trend (e.g., Key Drivers, Contributing Factors).

469df7a8-b4bc-4e21-90c0-8d32b5f20cda.content_description: Driver 1 (Headline): A concise factor contributing to the market growth (e.g., technological adoption, infrastructure).

abb50c86-af03-44c8-8f1c-9b06d2daa5e2.content_description: Driver 2 (Headline): A concise factor contributing to the market growth (e.g., demographic shift, consumer behavior).

6a839d9b-2b64-452e-9c63-b85cd1f4276c.content_description: Driver 1 (Description): Detailed explanation or supporting statistics for the first key driver.
content: Middle class projected to reach 26% of the population by 2026
Per capita income forecast to hit $7,500 by 2030, driving discretionary spending
Consumers spend $19–$21 monthly on makeup/skincare, fueling the premium segment

395b22b2-bf55-4fa4-9523-7b8468d3bcd6.content_description: Driver 2 (Description): Detailed explanation or supporting statistics for the second key driver.
content: E-commerce share of beauty sales expected to reach 24% by 2027
Over 75% smartphone penetration enables rapid digital adoption
Social commerce platforms (TikTok Shop, Shopee) drive high-volume sales and consumer engagement

27278319-c845-4093-8f60-3791d015c79d.content_description: Driver 3 (Description): Detailed explanation or supporting statistics for the third key driver.
content: Skincare dominates the product mix (43% share) with 11.8% CAGR projected through 2032
Demand is high for functional products like anti-aging and UV protection
Local natural/vegan segment is a high-growth niche, expanding at 30% CAGR

672ebb27-260f-4b29-b3f9-4f0a0744064b.original_content:
Founded in 2015 with a mission to deliver brand campaigns rooted in Vietnamese culture 
Developed the XPhin Model, a creative framework inspired by Vietnam’s phin coffee filter
Ideal for investors seeking culturally-rooted, scalable platforms in SEA
672ebb27-260f-4b29-b3f9-4f0a0744064b.content_description: Detailed bullet points supporting the core business definition, including history, mission, proprietary methods, and unique market appeal.
content: Combines international quality (Korean manufacturing) with hyper-localization for Vietnamese users
Only Vietnamese enterprise consistently ranked in the Top 10 makeup market share (3.2% in 2022)
Asset-light model ensures rapid scalability without heavy CapEx, optimizing capital deployment
Core products (e.g., Baby Skin Cushion) are tailored for local skin and climate (e.g., SPF 50+ PA+++)

f55f8930-dea2-4cfb-be96-3ba81e6ac3e9.original_content:
Track record of over 500 campaigns for 100+ brands across digital and social channels, emphasizing creativity and cultural relevance
Proven ability to adapt brand narratives to various sectors with high standards of execution
Diversified client base provides revenue stability and cross-sell potential, lowering customer concentration risk for investors
f55f8930-dea2-4cfb-be96-3ba81e6ac3e9.content_description: Detailed bullet points supporting market strength, including track record, client volume, sector adaptability, and revenue stability/risk mitigation.
content: Strong brand equity amplified by co-founder Hồ Ngọc Hà (celebrity Creative Director), building consumer trust
Extensive, nationwide distribution network of ~1,000 dedicated agents ensures deep market penetration
Omnichannel presence secured through placement in major modern retail (Guardian, Hasaki) and all major e-commerce platforms
Directly challenges the 90% market dominance held by foreign multinationals

84a05393-2f86-4df1-a55f-c131e6e60819.original_content: TBU after accessing to Xanh’s financial documents
84a05393-2f86-4df1-a55f-c131e6e60819.content_description: Placeholder for specific financial data, analysis, or key performance indicators (KPIs) supporting the financial summary.
content: Achieved profitability early (FY 2019), demonstrating efficient execution and healthy unit economics
Exceptional growth trajectory with an average annual growth rate of 150% (excluding 2021)
Current scale (implied US$12M contextual revenue) positions M.O.I to command a premium over global beauty multiples (median 2.6x EV/Revenue)
Management confidence signaled by preparations for a Series B funding round

6ce5ecd9-8b58-48a2-9a3c-5398e13c062f.original_content:
Positioning to become a one-stop platform for modern brand-building: blending culture, content, and commerce
Platform model unlocks economies of scale and cross-selling opportunities for strategic players
Ideal platform for both strategic and financial investors to “invest and build” and consolidate similar players in the market
6ce5ecd9-8b58-48a2-9a3c-5398e13c062f.content_description: Detailed bullet points supporting the future strategy, including positioning goals, platform benefits (e.g., economies of scale), and rationale for strategic investment.
content: Strategic expansion into high-growth, high-margin adjacencies (Haircare, intensive anti-aging care, vegan lines)
Skincare sub-brand (DA by M.O.I) targets the largest market segment (43% share), increasing customer lifetime value
High strategic M&A value for global acquirers (e.g., Amorepacific, P&G) seeking immediate access to local intelligence
Acquisition bypasses high import tariffs and the complexity of establishing an authentic local brand identity from scratch
